name: Non-Addictive Totally Accurate Medieval Love Story Generator
name_original: Non-Addictive Totally Accurate Medieval Love Story Generator
description:
To start playing, kindly click "Run game".

Then, (after the screen goes dark) click "She-1" to go to the first paragraph of the story.

You should be able to restart by refreshing your browser page or by just clicking the "go back" arrow on the left side of the screen.

Thanks for playing!

That's my first published game project, it was done solo and helped me to get out of depression. Thus, it's quite short and primitive!

Your feedback is super important and would be greatly appreciated!!

Shining Armour
